definitions.definition: The belief that the Universe is in some sense divine and should be revered . Pantheism identifies the universe with God but denies any personality or transcendence of such a God.
The belief in all gods; omnitheism .

main_definition: ( religion ) The belief that the Universe is in some sense divine and should be revered . Pantheism identifies the universe with God but denies any personality or transcendence of such a God.
secondary_definitions: ( rare , religion ) The belief in all gods; omnitheism .
